name: purejs-idb
author: Aleksey Magner
description: Service for managing IndexedDB local storage.

scripts.deploy: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.patch: yarn build && git add . && npm version patch --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && yarn deploy
scripts.minor: yarn build && git add . && npm version minor --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && yarn deploy
scripts.major: yarn build && git add . && npm version major --force -m 'Upgrade to %s' && yarn deploy
